Package atg.commerce.search.refinement

Class Summary
CatalogRefineElementMap Derivation method that returns a Map of catalog ids to lists of refinement elements.
CategoryFacetValue Represents a category-specific refinement element.
CommerceFacetManager CommerceFacetManager extends FacetManager and provides commerce specific functionality to the refinement repository.
CommerceFacetSearchTools  
CommerceFacetTrailDroplet Droplet class that provides a means of creating a FacetTrail bean object.
CommerceFacetTrailTools  
RQLPropertyDescriptor A user-defined repository property descriptor that uses RQL to get a list of components as its value.
